attributes.action: Abolish the Coarse fishing close season on all rivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The close season was put into place in order to give freshwater fish an unpressured breeding spell. This is a complete waste of time, as different species breed at different times of the year, anywhere between January and August(later on occasions) depending on climate.
Also, the close season puts unneccessary finacial pressure onto our hard working tackle?bait suppliers

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
